title: "Robotic arms with a brain-machine interface allows partially paralyzed man to feed himself"
excerpt: "Recent advances in neural science, robotics, and software have enabled scientists to develop a robotic system that responds to muscle movement signals from a partially paralyzed person relayed through a brain-machine interface."
